spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall apartment massing (long rectangular unit with 3 bedrooms + central living/dining + right-side kitchen zone) is loosely similar, but several key spatial placements do not match the 2D plan. Major mismatch in balcony locations (central living/dining balcony in plan is not represented correctly; balconies appear at ends instead). Internal circulation/wide passages shown in plan are not preserved; room proportions and corridor widths appear compressed/reshaped. Door and window layouts do not align reliably with the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness looks somewhat consistent in the render, but structural/plan fidelity is weak: the plan’s defined toilet block count and placement (multiple toilets including a powder toilet) is not faithfully reconstructed. The kitchen–utility relationship from the plan is not clearly preserved (utility appears missing or merged). Adjacencies are partially correct (kitchen on right, bedrooms grouped), but key planned connections (living-to-balcony, passage structure) deviate. At least one extra balcony/terrace-like element is introduced that is not supported by the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is generic and only loosely corresponds to room function (beds in bedrooms, dining in living area). Placement does not reliably map to the 2D plan’s exact room boundaries/openings. Furniture scale appears mostly plausible, but the mapping accuracy to the specified layout is low.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is generally correct and the model reads as an isometric cutaway. However, visual clarity is reduced by soft/blurred rendering and low-detail geometry. Lighting is acceptable but flat. Some geometry feels simplified, and openings (doors/windows) are not crisply defined, harming interpretability.

detected_errors.description: Balcony placement mismatch: the 2D plan shows a balcony directly off the Living & Dining (top/central), but the 3D render does not place that balcony correctly.

Hallucinated exterior space: a right-end balcony/terrace-like area appears in the 3D render that is not supported by the 2D floor plan (which shows only the master balcony and the living/dining balcony).
Missing element: the Utility space adjacent to the Kitchen (as labeled in the plan) is not clearly present as a distinct room in the 3D render.
Missing elements: the plan includes multiple toilets (including a powder toilet and attached/common toilets); the 3D render does not clearly reconstruct the full count and their correct positions.
Door placement/orientation inconsistency: door locations and swing/orientation (including the main entry and internal toilet/bedroom doors) do not match the plan’s indicated openings.
Window placement mismatch: bedroom/living window locations do not correspond to the 2D plan’s exterior openings, especially around balcony-adjacent walls.
Proportion distortion: wide passages/corridor widths and several room aspect ratios shown in the 2D plan are not preserved in the 3D render (spaces appear compressed and re-proportioned).
Rendering artifact / low clarity: blurred textures and simplified openings reduce the ability to verify exact wall/door/window alignment.
